original_text: The Teacher tried to find the right words, so that he could show the true meaning of what he wrote. The Teacher tried to find the right words, so that he could show the true meaning of what he wrote.
korean_text: 전도자는 힘써 아름다운 말들을 구하였나니 진리의 말씀들을 정직하게 기록하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The Teacher tried to find the right words
so that he could show the true meaning
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 진정한 의미를 보여줄 수 있었습니다
